747f675a-2768-4051-ad1b-2098f827deac: A character that selects this talent gains a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. These feats must be taken from the following list: Bull Rush, Greater Bull Rush, Improved Blind Fight, Blind Fight, Greater Blind Fight.
bfa0bb3b-41f9-4f5b-8a1f-0c0bffeb3c89: A character that selects this talent gains a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. These feats must be taken from the following list: Deflect Arrows, Lightning Reflexes, Improved Lightning Reflexes, Dodge, Combat Mobility.
04e0f202-8a17-4e53-b0b4-ea771af64752: A character that selects this talent gains a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. These feats must be taken from the following list: Great Fortitude, Improved Great Fortitude, Endurance, Trip, Greater Trip
4ae707a0-eaef-40ca-b1ce-20308632afa7: A character that selects this talent gains a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. These feats must be taken from the following list: Iron Will, Improved Iron Will, Persuasive, Dazzling Display, Dreadful Carnage.
ee5191d4-5475-4986-9ca5-a6ea87374a44:
A dark elementalist uses the souls of others to protect herself from the dangers of burn. She can't choose to accept burn if doing so would raise her total number of points of burn above 3. However, a number of times per day equal to her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g} she can gather up the souls of dead creatures with {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}HD{/g} sum equal to or higher than her {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}. When she does, some of her existing burn is unloaded into the departing souls, racking it with unspeakable torment, but reducing her current burn total by 1 point.
A dark elementalist gains {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} bonuses from elemental overflow based on how many times that day she has successfully used soul power to rack souls, rather than based on her current burn total. For instance, a 9th-level dark elementalist who had used soul power three or more times during the course of the day would add a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attack rolls and a +6 bonus on damage rolls. A dark elementalist does not gain {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} bonuses to physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} or a chance to ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} and sneak attacks from elemental overflow.
This ability alters burn and elemental overflow and replaces internal buffer.
5d218c4e-8f9f-404a-841f-5fb410084fdb:
A dark elementalist's base {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} bonus from the kineticist class is equal to 2 + 1/2 her kineticist level, and her base Reflex and Fortitude save bonuses are equal to 1/3 her kineticist level. She gains all Knowledge and Lore skills as class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
A dark elementalist uses her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier instead of her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier to determine her {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with wild talents, the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} of Constitution-based wild talents, the durations of wild talents with Constitution-based durations, her {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g} for wild talents, and any other Constitution-based effects of all her wild talents.
This alters the kineticist's class skills and base saving throws and the key {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} of wild talents.
929114c1-8f2f-4845-bfc4-207f4bf99d15: A geokineticist adds {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}Knowledge (world){/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
b4e7bd38-5209-4a21-aa92-a0df641c79b7: A hydrokineticist adds {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
2bb8b8f9-6316-425b-b766-9acb981fe6f7: A hydrokineticist can select either cold blast or water blast as her simple blast. She gains one of them when she first selects water, and must select water again with expanded element to gain the other.
5d7d770e-d0fb-4565-8bdc-d42ed4e9098d: A kinetic knight dons armor and wields a blade of elemental energy. Kinetic knights are rare in the Inner Sea region, but not unknown; many realize their elemental powers while training for battle.
d6f57421-5afd-412b-811c-d9ae87bda63d: A kineticist can briefly, but significantly empower their blasts by adding several infusions. This inflicts burn, which lowers their {g|Encyclopedia:HP}health{/g} until the next time they {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}. Special abilities can help a kineticist mitigate or completely prevent burn.
67748a71-e3bd-4ba3-8446-64cbd1119901: A kineticist can use wild talents — magical abilities similar to {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} but drawn from the kineticist's innate psychic talent and usable at will. Wild talents are typically {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} (though some are supernatural abilities), and take a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} to use unless otherwise noted. Every wild talent has an effective spell level. A kineticist can always select 1st-level wild talents, but she can select a wild talent of a higher level only if her kineticist level is at least double the wild talent's effective spell level. Kinetic blast and defense wild talents are always considered to have an effective spell level equal to 1/2 the kineticist's {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} (to a maximum effective spell level of 9th at kineticist level 18th). Unless otherwise noted, the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against a wild talent is equal to 10 + the wild talent's effective spell level + the kineticist's {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. The kineticist uses her Constitution modifier on all {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} for wild talents. In addition to the wild talents she gains from her other class features, at 2nd level and every 2 levels thereafter, a kineticist selects a new utility wild talent from the list of options available to her. A kineticist can select only universal wild talents or those that match her element.
e4ea32c2-6e16-4d50-9584-14d9e4e776bb: A psychokineticist uses his {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier instead of his {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier to determine his {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with wild talents, the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} of Constitution-based wild talents, the durations of wild talents with Constitution-based durations, his {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g} for wild talents, and other Constitution-based effects of all his wild talents.
9a5f7712-0fb8-40d1-9501-d7390766e7cb: A psychokineticist's elemental energy sends strange elemental humors and planar echoes through his brain instead of reshaping his body with matter from his element. Instead of gaining {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} from elemental overflow, he gains alchemical bonuses to his mental ability scores in equal amounts (a +2 alchemical bonus to two mental ability scores at 6th level if he has at least 3 points of burn; a +4 alchemical bonus to one mental ability score and a +2 alchemical bonus to the other two at 11th level if he has at least 5 points of burn; and a +6 alchemical bonus to one mental ability score, a +4 alchemical bonus to another, and a +2 alchemical bonus to the last at 16th level if he has at least 7 points of burn). A psychokineticist doesn't gain a chance to negate {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} and sneak attacks based on his burn. Otherwise, his elemental overflow works just like a normal kineticist's.
f7ed0378-6e21-4f3c-a924-38c8b155b14a:
A psychokineticist's mind strains when he overtaxes himself. He takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, and Wisdom-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} for each point of burn he has accepted, rather than taking nonlethal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from burn. He can accept an amount of burn equal to his Wisdom modifier (rather than 3 + his Wisdom modifier). Otherwise, his burn works just like a normal kineticist's.
This ability alters burn.
28f39ab8-da3c-46d7-8d62-548e882dc0df: A pyrokineticist adds {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
174ea3c8-a769-4b28-958a-628588a55dba: After the battle, you can dismiss area infusion effect at will. You must be out of combat and within a 100-foot range of the infusion's effect. Dismissing a infusion is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
7882810b-efac-4444-b521-1ee4a770b66b: An aerokineticist adds {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} to her list of class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
a4c6df68-e656-4c0f-a2b9-a157c6118a4a: An overwhelming soul uses her {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier instead of her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier to determine her {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with wild talents, the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} of Constitution based wild talents, the duration of wild talents with a Constitution-based duration, her {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g} for wild talents, and the other Constitution based effects of all her wild talents.
22d45f6d-cec3-417a-aaaa-5531f4601fd5:
An overwhelming soul's mind is strong enough to protect her body from the stress of channeling the elements. However, in exchange, she is unable to push her limits quite as far as other kineticists.
She can't choose to accept burn, though she can use wild talents with a burn cost if she can reduce that cost to 0 points with abilities such as gather power and infusion specialization. At 6th level, once per day, she can reduce the total burn cost of any wild talent by 1.
She can use this ability an additional time per day at 10th level and every 4 levels thereafter.
36ace028-1967-4715-b085-35c481e14ebd: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the kinetic knight can spend one use of his resolve to remove the fatigued, shaken, or sickened condition. If the kinetic knight is at least 11th level, he can alternatively remove the exhausted, frightened, nauseated, or staggered condition.
0f759d31-fb62-4cbb-bafa-e46135809c0b:
At 11th level, a blood kineticist can drain the vitality from her enemy's blood to restore her own.
If her blast hits (or the enemy fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against a blast without an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}) the blood kineticist can activate the kinetic healer utility wild talent without paying the burn cost. This is a 5th-level substance infusion that costs 3 points of burn and can be used with water and blood blasts.
72c386ab-aca0-4e29-a665-2da77e3c032e: At 11th level, when using gather power as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, a kineticist can reduce the total burn cost of a single wild talent by 2 points instead of 1. When using gather power for 1 full {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, she can reduce the burn cost of a single wild talent by 3 points instead of 2.
7b768354-7a70-42f2-ab25-c961b60e1419:
At 16th level, a kineticist becomes more adept at creating composite blasts. She reduces the burn cost of all composite blasts by 1 point.
This can't reduce the cost of a composite blast below 0 points.
2192c326-8cfc-4c7a-b21c-4fad85a79e9d: At 19th level, a kineticist chooses one type of metakinesis, such as empower or quicken. She reduces the burn cost of that metakinesis by 1 point (to a minimum of 0 points).
48cdc9b7-71cd-45d0-96fb-dc0d6cb33410: At 1st level, a blood kineticist can use her abilities to wrack a target within 30 feet, harming the target by manipulating its blood from the inside. The target takes half the normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of the blood kineticist's blast, and can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} to reduce that amount to 1/4 normal damage, but the damage is untyped and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. This is a 1st-level form infusion that costs 0 points of burn and can be used with water and blood blasts.
c7ca0afa-0683-4181-8d91-0ab5b3d7d631: At 1st level, a blood kineticist can use her abilities to wrack a target within 30 feet, harming the target by manipulating its blood from the inside. The target takes half the normal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of the blood kineticist's blast, and can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} to reduce that amount to 1/4 normal damage, but the damage is untyped and ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. This is a 1st-level form infusion that costs 0 points of burn and can be used with water and blood blasts.
949c393a-ab3b-4c88-9300-78561d63a73a: At 1st level, a kinetic knight gains the kinetic blade form infusion, and it costs 0 points of burn instead of 1 point. She can't use her kinetic blast without the kinetic blade form infusion or an infusion that lists kinetic blade as a prerequisite.
aab6f2cd-d2fc-4357-8e4f-adf80c7fb733: At 1st level, a kineticist can overexert herself to channel more power than normal, pushing past the limit of what is safe for her body by accepting burn. Some of her wild talents allow her to accept burn in exchange for a greater effect, while others require her to accept a certain amount of burn to use that talent at all. For each point of burn she accepts, a kineticist takes (1 per {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}) points of nonlethal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. This damage can't be healed by any means other than getting a full night's {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}, which removes all burn and associated nonlethal damage. Nonlethal damage from burn can't be reduced or redirected, and a kineticist incapable of taking nonlethal damage can't accept burn. A kineticist can accept only 1 point of burn per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This limit rises to 2 points of burn at 6th level, and rises by 1 additional point every 3 levels thereafter. A kineticist can't choose to accept burn if it would put her total number of points of burn higher than (3 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier), though she can be forced to accept more burn from a source outside her control. A kineticist who has accepted burn never benefits from abilities that allow her to ignore or alter the effects she receives from nonlethal damage.
987eb4f4-ffd5-47b2-9dff-b41aeb1b0c64: At 1st level, a kineticist chooses one primary element on which to focus. This element determines how she accesses the raw power of the Ethereal Plane, and grants her access to specific wild talents and additional class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She gains her selected element's basic utility wild talent (basic aerokinesis, etc.) as a bonus wild talent.
b53aaf8d-a392-489f-9d80-eadd5c91147f:
At 1st level, a kineticist gains a kinetic blast wild talent of her choice. This kinetic blast must be a simple blast that matches her element.
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the kineticist can unleash a kinetic blast at a single target in close range. She must have at least one hand free to aim the blast. All {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from a kinetic blast is treated as magic for the purpose of bypassing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. Kinetic blasts count as a type of weapon for the purpose of {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} such as Weapon Focus. The kineticist is never considered to be wielding or gripping the kinetic blast, and she can't use Vital Strike feats with kinetic blasts. Even the weakest kinetic blast involves a sizable mass of elemental matter or energy, so kinetic blasts always deal full damage to swarms of any {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} (though only area blasts deal extra damage to swarms).
Each simple blast is either a physical blast or an energy blast.
Physical blasts are {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} that deal an amount of damage equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}+1 + the kineticist's {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier, increasing by 1d6+1 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st. {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell resistance{/g} doesn't apply against physical blasts.
Energy blasts are ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} that deal an amount of damage equal to 1d6 + 1/2 the kineticist's Constitution modifier, increasing by 1d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.
Composite blasts combine elements to form a new blast. When a kineticist gains a new element through expanded element, she gains access to all composite blasts for which she qualifies.
Most composite blasts are either physical or energy blasts, like simple blasts.
Physical composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6+2 + the kineticist's Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6+2 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.
Energy composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6 + 1/2 the kineticist's Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.
65752301-45a1-4254-b852-d1e2271ca7a8:
At 1st level, a kineticist gains an infusion wild talent from the list of options available based on her elemental focus. She gains additional infusions at 3rd, 5th, 9th, 11th, 13th, 17th, and 19th levels. By using infusions along with her kinetic blasts, a kineticist can alter her kinetic blasts to suit her needs. Infusions come in two types, each of which changes a kinetic blast differently: a substance infusion causes an additional effect, while a form infusion causes the kinetic blast to manifest in a different way. Each infusion can alter only certain kinds of kinetic blasts, which are listed in its Associated Blasts entry. Each time the kineticist uses one of her kinetic blast wild talents, she can apply up to one associated form infusion and up to one associated substance infusion.
Some infusions change the {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} required to activate a kinetic blast or entirely transform the kinetic blast's normal effects.
The burn cost listed in each infusion's Burn entry is added to the burn cost of the kinetic blast the infusion modifies.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} against an infusion is based on the associated kinetic blast's effective {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} level, not the level of the infusion. The DCs for form infusions are calculated using the kineticist's {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier instead of her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. When a kineticist modifies a kinetic blast with a form infusion and a substance infusion that both require saving throws, each target first attempts a saving throw against the form infusion. If a target succeeds and a successful save negates the infusion's effects, the entire kinetic blast is negated; otherwise, the target then attempts a saving throw against the substance infusion. If a kineticist's form and substance infusions both alter the kinetic blast's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, apply the substance infusion's alteration first.
9d760d4d-c9e1-4518-a797-6d423d65d7cb:
At 1st level, the kinetic knight becomes proficient with medium and heavy armor and shields (except tower shields).
A kinetic knight gains the elemental defense ability at 4th level, rather than 2nd.
This ability alters elemental defense.
8972dfde-2222-4b57-967f-8943b8b022af: At 20th level, a blood kineticist, because of her utter control over her own blood, is immune to bleed, poisons, diseases, and the sickened and nauseated conditions.
28ae165d-4cd7-41f1-9e0f-7f8586e65811:
At 3rd level, a kineticist's body surges with energy from her chosen element whenever she accepts burn. In addition, she receives a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on her {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} with kinetic blasts equal to the total number of points of burn she currently has, to a maximum bonus of +1 for every 3 kineticist levels she possesses. She also receives a bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with her kinetic blast equal to double the bonus on attack rolls.
As a kineticist's body becomes more and more suffused with her element, she begins to gain more powerful benefits.
Starting at 6th level, whenever she has at least 3 points of burn, the kineticist gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} bonus to two physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} of her choice. She also gains a chance to ignore the effects of a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} or sneak attack equal to 5% for every current point of burn. At 11th level, whenever the kineticist has at least 5 points of burn, these bonuses increase to a +4 size bonus to one physical ability score of her choice and a +2 size bonus to each of her other two physical ability scores.
At 16th level, whenever the kineticist has at least 7 points of burn, these bonuses increase to a +6 size bonus to one physical ability score of her choice, a +4 size bonus to a second physical ability score of her choice, and a +2 size bonus to the remaining physical ability score.
c610ff4e-197c-4578-95bc-4d7318b1c893:
At 3rd level, a kineticist's body surges with energy from her chosen element whenever she accepts burn. In addition, she receives a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on her {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} with kinetic blasts equal to the total number of points of burn she currently has, to a maximum bonus of +1 for every 3 kineticist levels she possesses. She also receives a bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with her kinetic blast equal to double the bonus on attack rolls.
Furthermore, an elemental engine, while at maximum burn, doubles those bonuses, and when using gather power, she reduces the burn cost by 1 additional point.
90c9fe9c-20b8-4baa-8a8a-1c5e12c7096d:
At 3rd level, an overwhelming soul gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with her kinetic blasts. The damage bonus doesn't apply to kinetic blade, kinetic whip, or other infusions that don't apply the damage bonus from elemental overflow.
This bonus increases by 1 at 6th level and every 3 levels thereafter.
58665350-e270-4680-bb11-d69da415053d: At 5th level, a blood kineticist can infuse her blasts with a vicious power that causes internal or external bleeding. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}, the target takes 1 point of bleed {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every die of the blast's damage. This is a 2nd-level substance infusion that costs 2 points of burn and can be used with water and blood blasts.
7eef3c99-2c21-400b-b27b-0d2b8e1b9235: At 5th level, a kineticist gains the ability to alter her kinetic blasts as if with metamagic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} by accepting burn. By accepting 1 point of burn, she can empower her kinetic blast (as if using Empower {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g}). At 9th level, by accepting 2 points of burn, she can maximize her kinetic blast as if using Maximize Spell. At 13th level, by accepting 3 points of burn, she can quicken her kinetic blast as if using Quicken Spell.
1e574c7a-2a7f-42cc-b019-6958199b603f:
At 5th level, whenever a kineticist uses one or more infusions with a blast, she reduces the combined burn cost of the infusions by 1. This can't reduce the total cost of the infusions used below 0.
She reduces the burn cost by 1 additional point at 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 20th levels.
3ed604b5-13d1-4e38-bf82-caba98013ecc:
At 6th level, once per day, she can reduce the total burn cost of any wild talent by 1.
She can use this ability an additional time per day at 10th level and every 4 levels thereafter.
6c2ee053-524d-4bde-8385-b090fb74f375:
At 7th level, a kineticist learns to use another element or expands her understanding of her own element. She can choose any element, including her primary element. She gains one of that element's simple blast wild talents that she does not already possess, if any. She also gains all composite blast wild talents whose prerequisites she meets. She doesn't gain the defensive wild talent of the expanded element unless she later selects it with the expanded defense utility wild talent.
At 15th level, the kineticist can either select a new element or expand her understanding of her original element. She can't select the same element she selected at 7th level. She gains all the benefits from her new expanded element as listed above.
0a403a22-2283-4603-83fd-f0391eb1fae5: At 9th level, a blood kineticist can infuse her blasts with the ability to manipulate her opponent's insides to the point of impairing their function. On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}, the target is sickened for 1 minute. This is a 4th-level substance infusion that costs 3 points of burn and can be used with water and blood blasts.

c84cb98e-7154-4bc7-8762-b30c3245f8c3: If she has both hands free, a kineticist can gather energy or elemental matter as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. Gathering power in this way allows the kineticist to reduce the total burn cost of a blast wild talent she uses in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} by 1 point. The kineticist can instead gather power for 1 full round in order to reduce the total burn cost of a blast wild talent used on her next turn by 2 points (to a minimum of 0 points). If she does so, she can also gather power as a move {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} during her next turn to reduce the burn cost by a total of 3 points. This ability can never reduce the burn cost of a wild talent below 0 points.
7ee23bbe-83aa-45f0-aa1f-428f699d9564: Kineticist is one of the most difficult classes to master. They are the masters of elements, capable of creating elemental blasts with almost no boundaries. These blasts can be devastating to the enemies.
79ac6538-4fdb-4166-82ea-a675e05c2526: Kineticist spends a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} to gather energy or elemental matter and reduce the total burn cost of a chosen blast by 3. After that, they use the chosen blast. If the burn cost drops to 0 before the whole time is spent, they stop gathering power and use the chosen blast immediately. To use this ability, the kineticist needs to have their both hands free. This ability can never reduce the burn cost of a blast below 0 points.
b86420bd-74f2-486c-9fb0-21d9750e53cc: Kineticist spends a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g} to gather energy or elemental matter and reduce the total burn cost of a chosen blast by 2. After that, they use the chosen blast. If the burn cost drops to 0 before the whole {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} is spent, they stop gathering power and use the chosen blast immediately. To use this ability, the kineticist needs to have their both hands free. This ability can never reduce the burn cost of a blast below 0 points.
17e487fc-2a6f-43ee-a65d-daddbcb789d1: Kineticist spends a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} to gather energy or elemental matter and reduce the total burn cost of a chosen blast by 1. After that, they use the chosen blast. To use this ability, the kineticist needs to have their both hands free. This ability can never reduce the burn cost of a blast below 0 points.
f3a5ecd3-c13d-422d-a4d0-8883ea458bca:
Kineticists are living channels for elemental matter and energy, manipulating the world around them by drawing upon inner reserves from their own bodies. Kineticists often awaken to their kinetic abilities during a violent or traumatic experience, releasing their power involuntarily. As kinetic power is seldom inherited, kineticists are rarely able to find mentors to guide them, so they must delve into these mysteries on their own to learn to control their gifts.
Kineticists generally use their powers to assail their foes from range, but based on the way their talents develop, they can channel their kinetic abilities for a variety of situations. Kineticists are usually quite different from their families and friends, so they often strike out on their own or alongside others with extraordinary talents.
4c872a4f-ad2e-4fb3-b385-e52f89e6bf9c: Kineticists are proficient with all {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}simple weapons{/g} and light armor, but not shields.
51adddc9-921a-49b6-8ac0-39ace46975f7: Kineticists who focus on the element of air are called aerokineticists. Aerokineticists often control air flow or electricity, specializing in mobility and ranged combat.
6966dc8e-1133-42cd-8c7a-936c9060bf8f: Kineticists who focus on the element of earth are called geokineticists. Geokineticists manipulate the earth itself, and they are masters of defensive techniques.
181765b5-6a80-49e1-99b1-270c24c14e5d: Kineticists who focus on the element of fire are called pyrokineticists. Pyrokineticists wield elemental fire as a potent weapon, and they possess a powerful offense.
9ba7f6a4-547f-44ea-993d-f81565a9f547: Kineticists who focus on the element of water are called hydrokineticists. Hydrokineticists master the flow of water or the numbing chill of cold, and they are known for their versatility and flowing forms, like the ever-changing currents.
06262e4e-022a-4cb8-bf57-a82997fc4aba: Shroud of Water — Increase Armor Bonus
3fc98805-9d36-45ee-add4-2ba5c54e8b5a: Shroud of Water — Increase Shield Bonus
acd44680-acc7-4709-85b6-8f1fc1f61cfc: Some kineticists have such a powerful personality that they can seize control of their element with their minds alone, without endangering their bodies.
d83822dc-e344-4f80-86e1-4b0158ffee8d: Some kineticists use the overflowing elemental power seeping through their bodies to manifest additional powers.
af630ad3-d2e6-4722-97bb-44e11f7f3f08: Some kineticists who are loathe to suffer the consequences of channeling their power study the darkest esoteric energies of the planes and use souls to fuel their occult might. The spiritual tortures these dark elementalists inflict upon their victims' souls are horrifically selfish acts on par with the actions of daemons.
00d1c919-cad4-40cc-ab5d-05b56d252cb6:
Starting at 13th level, an elemental engine gains more benefits while at maximum burn, depending on the element she chose at 1st level.
If the chosen element was air, you gain an additional +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with electricity descriptor. Additionally, you are under the effect of the freedom of movement spell.
If the chosen element was earth, you gain an additional +2 bonus on saving throws against spells with acid descriptor. Additionally, you gain immunity to trip, bull rush, and pull {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g}.
If the chosen element was fire, you gain an additional +2 bonus on saving throws against spells with fire descriptor. Additionally, you are under the effect of the haste spell.
If the chosen element was water, you gain an additional +2 bonus on saving throws against spells with cold descriptor. Additionally, any enemy in a 10-foot radius must make a Fortitude saving throw ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the kineticist level + {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} or become slowed, as per the slow spell, for 1 round.
26284a4a-7353-4511-a3f0-e007e52d73ce:
Starting at 3rd level, the kinetic knight gains resolve that he can call upon to endure even the most devastating wounds and afflictions. He can use this ability once per day at 3rd level, plus one additional time per day for every two kinetic knight levels beyond 3rd.
Determined: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the kinetic knight can spend one use of his resolve to remove the fatigued, shaken, or sickened condition. If the kinetic knight is at least 11th level, he can alternatively remove the exhausted, frightened, nauseated, or staggered condition.
Resolute: Whenever the kinetic knight is required to make a Fortitude or {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}, he can spend one use of his resolve as an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice and take the better result.
This ability replaces the kineticist infusion gained at 3rd level and supercharge.
3411f631-e49b-4ae6-a0dd-c019392f0193:
Starting at 7th level, an elemental engine gains additional benefits while at maximum burn, depending on the element she chose at 1st level.
If the chosen element was air, you gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with electricity descriptor. Additionally, you gain immunity to ground-based spells and abilities.
If the chosen element was earth, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against spells with acid descriptor. Additionally, you gain a +4 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} against trip, bull rush, and pull {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g}.
If the chosen element was fire, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against spells with fire descriptor. Additionally, you gain a +20 enhancement bonus to your {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}.
If the chosen element was water, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against spells with cold descriptor. Additionally, any enemy striking you in melee combat with a non-{g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} melee weapon must make a Fortitude saving throw ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the kineticist level + {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) or become slowed, as per the slow spell, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
8ea57fef-fdbd-4bd8-a29f-31e32cb6670e: The first time a blood kineticist selects water with expanded element, she doesn't gain the cold simple blast or the ice composite blast; instead, she gains the blood composite blast, which costs 2 points of burn. A blood blast is a physical blast that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g}. It is associated with the same infusions as the water blast.
d6f0bc17-cca3-4969-b061-7c87ab598541: The kinetic knight can use her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score in place of her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} score when qualifying for combat {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}. This ability counts as having Combat Expertise for the purpose of feat prerequisites.
e27e0d04-5508-44aa-80a5-a7183f1050e7: These abilities modify the blasts. There are two types of infusions: substances and forms. Substances supplement the blasts with various effects, such as the ability to ignite the target. Forms change the blast itself, for example, modifying its range or area of effect.
c6b872ba-3de0-42dd-91d2-12ff74c5a39e: This is a special {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} whose type depends on the selected element. They can deal both physical and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g}, and frequently can hit from afar. They can be modified or empowered, and if a kineticist possesses more than one element, their powers can be combined. Kineticist create their blasts with bare hands, any weapons would hinder them.
b3e7c2b0-c10b-4faf-8087-6778fcbd6890: To a blood kineticist, the water in a creature's blood is just like any other sort, and she uses that knowledge to brutal ends.
7273d622-fc71-4eef-bd24-062c805bcbd2: Whenever the kinetic knight is required to make a Fortitude or {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}, he can spend one use of his resolve as an immediate {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice and take the better result. He must decide to use this ability before he rolls the saving throw.
fe891de8-4d2a-4e61-99d4-32926811fa21: While most kineticists channel elemental power through their bodies, rare kineticists channel such power through their minds. Psychokineticists lack strong spirit, and so this energy ravages their minds but unleashes power locked in their ruptured emotions. Sometimes a psychokineticist inadvertently unleashes his power when he experiences an outburst of strong emotion, potentially making a psychokineticist an outcast or even an accidental killer.
2e574902-612e-46a8-9b98-154db3bbbe75: You can perceive the world by creating high-pitched noises and listening to their echoes. This gives you blindsight to a range of 30 feet.
ab263f8f-d607-449a-b566-2b6ec940ba02: You constantly surround yourself with a whirling torrent of air, crackling arcs of lightning, or both to protect yourself from {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g}. All ranged {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made with physical weapons suffer a 20% miss chance against you. This ability has no effect on ray attacks. The miss chance increases by 5% for every 5 kineticist levels you possess beyond 2nd. By accepting 1 point of burn, you can increase the miss chance by 5% until the next time your burn is removed. You can continue to accept points of burn to increase the miss chance further, up to a maximum of 75%.
4017d118-dff5-4a75-91f3-fcd0f8e75339: Your next Kinetic Healer ability burn cost is reduced to zero.
